name: part_006
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY2】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment HoneyWorks stage DAY2【チラ見せ】 [XuQm_HL2ntg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Promotional video for Bandai's hololive collaboration goods.
Commercial for Weiß Schwarz 'hololive production Summer Collection'.
Commercial for Weiß Schwarz Blau featuring HOLOSTARS.
Promotional video for Good Smile Company's hololive Nendoroids.
Promotional video for FuRyu Prize hololive goods.
Promotional video for the Gawr Gura iPASS Card.
Promotional video for Miruhako by JOYSOUND.
Display of the Hoshimachi Suisei 1/7 scale figure by DesignCOCO.
Display of fan messages on the 'Capture the Moment' board.

subtitles.original: ドンジャラNEOやマイク、ステッキなどたくさんの商品が発売いたします。
subtitles.english: Donjara NEO, microphones, sticks, and many other products will be released.

subtitles.original: バンダイブース、バンダイスピリッツブースでは、会場限定グッズも無料配布中！
subtitles.english: At the Bandai and Bandai Spirits booths, venue-exclusive goods are also being distributed for free!

subtitles.original: プレバンではすぐに使えるクーポンももらえる！
subtitles.english: On P-Bandai, you can also get coupons that can be used immediately!

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツ！
subtitles.english: Weiß Schwarz!

subtitles.original: 楽しむ準備はいい？
subtitles.english: Are you ready to have fun?

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツの舞台でも青春しよう！
subtitles.english: Let's enjoy our youth on the stage of Weiß Schwarz too!

subtitles.original: プレミアムブースター ホロライブプロダクション Summer Collection 3月22日発売！
subtitles.english: Premium Booster Hololive Production Summer Collection, on sale March 22nd!

subtitles.original: ブシロード
subtitles.english: Bushiroad

subtitles.original: ホロスターズがヴァイスシュヴァルツブラウに登場！
subtitles.english: HOLOSTARS makes their appearance in Weiß Schwarz Blau!

subtitles.original: ようこそ、カードゲームの舞台へ。
subtitles.english: Welcome to the stage of card games.

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツブラウ スタートデッキ＆ブースターパック『ホロスターズ』好評発売中！
subtitles.english: Weiß Schwarz Blau Start Deck & Booster Pack 'HOLOSTARS' is now on sale!

subtitles.original: ブシロード
subtitles.english: Bushiroad

subtitles.original: hololive SUPER EXPO 2024開催を記念して...
subtitles.english: To commemorate the holding of hololive SUPER EXPO 2024...

subtitles.original: ホロライブメンバーのねんどろいどが新衣装になって再登場！
subtitles.english: Nendoroids of hololive members are back in their new outfits!

subtitles.original: 新しいねんどろいどもお楽しみに！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to the new Nendoroids as well!

subtitles.original: フリューから『ホロライブ』プライズが全国アミューズメント施設に...
subtitles.english: Hololive prizes from FuRyu are coming to amusement facilities nationwide...

subtitles.original: 2024年7月以降に続々登場！
subtitles.english: Appearing one after another starting from July 2024!

subtitles.original: 今後国内のホロライブメンバー全員展開予定！
subtitles.english: We plan to roll out all domestic hololive members in the future!

subtitles.original: フリュー
subtitles.english: FuRyu

subtitles.original: a-
subtitles.english: a-

subtitles.original: 推しの曲、めーっちゃいいね！
subtitles.english: My oshi's song is sooo good!

subtitles.original: みるハコちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Miruhako-chan!

subtitles.original: みるハコなら、臨場感たっぷりで推しのコンテンツが楽しめる！
subtitles.english: With Miruhako, you can enjoy your favorite contents with a great sense of presence!

subtitles.original: みるハコ最高！
subtitles.english: Miruhako is the best!

subtitles.original: お外も増やそう、みるハコ。
subtitles.english: Let's increase the fun outdoors too, Miruhako.
